On bord of the "Siam"
M was en route from Melbourne to WA.

Allow me, my Lord, to introduce to you the generous supporter of the geographic enterprises of Colonel Warburton and of the two last expeditions of Mr Giles. The hon. Th. Elder is on a visit to his native country, and I feel sure, he will regard it an honor to be introduced to the Royal Geographic Society by your Lordship,
Lord Russell was Foreign Secretary of the Royal Geographical Society. while the great British forum of geographic research will doubtless recognize the generosity of this excellent man, who rendered known by his private means most extensive tracts of the Australian Continent, and who is likely to promote still further geographic mapping after his return to his Australian Home.
